line: The clock struck midnight, and the world froze.
She found a letter that wasn’t meant for her.
The last ship left the harbor as the sky turned red.
He woke up to find his shadow had a mind of its own.
The forest whispered secrets no one dared to hear.
A single footprint in the snow led to nowhere.
The mirror showed a reflection that wasn’t his.
She opened the door to a room that shouldn’t exist.
The city vanished overnight, leaving only echoes.
He heard his name called from the bottom of the well.
